name: Arcade-Style Space Combat
description:
Space Combat is an arcade-style game involving two players separated by a screen border with a sole objective to gun down the opponent using their bullets. The player on the left-hand side and right-hand side use the left-hand and right-hand side Alt keys to shoot, respectively. In addition, they each have 5 hearts, with a maximum of 3 bullets being shot at once. Players have the freedom to reset the game due to whatever circumstances they may encounter, with the subsequent ability to return to the home menu and admire the infinite scroll of a nice, arcade-like space background. 

Project Source Code:  https://github.com/ameerM09/Multiplayer-Space-Combat

Please check out my other game development, web development, and machine learning projects, and follow me over at GitHub!

I hope you and your friends enjoy your time playing Space Combat!
